title: Biden calls South Korea plane crash a 'tragedy,' says US ready to provide assistance
shortDescription: President Joe Biden said on Sunday that he was “deeply saddened” by the commercial plane crash in South Korea that killed 179 people.

title: 'Playing with fire': GOP lawmaker calls on Republicans to back Mike Johnson
shortDescription: Rep. Mike Lawler argued on Sunday that Republicans considering voting against House Speaker Mike Johnson for another term are “playing with fire.”

title: Trump sides with Elon Musk in H-1B visa debate
shortDescription: President-elect Donald Trump on Saturday sided with supporter and billionaire tech CEO Elon Musk in a public dispute over the use of the H-1B visa.

title: Treasury warns Congress that it could hit debt ceiling in January
shortDescription: Treasury Secretary Janet Yellen warned Congress that the country could hit the debt ceiling as soon as Jan. 14 in a letter sent Friday.

title: Elon Musk vows 'war' over H-1B visa program amid rift with some Trump supporters
shortDescription: H-1B visas are typically for three-year periods, though holders can extend them or apply for green cards.

title: Musk v. MAGA: Fight erupts over Trump skilled worker immigration plans
shortDescription: The battle playing out on X, the MAGA public square, has gone viral and turned personal over Musk's describing US workers as not 'super motivated'

title: Trump says he can 'save' TikTok, urges Supreme Court to pause ban
shortDescription: Trump told the Supreme Court he can negotiate a solution to the legal battle over TikTok's survival in the United States.

title: Trump said US, Italy's heritage stems from ancient Rome | Fact check
shortDescription: Trump spoke of a "shared cultural and political heritage" that dates back to ancient Rome in a 2019 news conference with the Italian president.

title: White House says 'early indications' point to Russia in plane crash
shortDescription: The White House said Friday there were "early indications" that Russian air defenses downed an Azerbaijan Airlines flight in Kazakhstan.

title: Who has donated to Trump's inaugural fund?
shortDescription: Ford, Amazon and Meta are among some of the biggest companies donating to Donald Trump's inaugural fund.

title: Post passes satire about Trump, Greenland as real | Fact check
shortDescription: The passages in the post were taken from a satirical New Yorker piece published in 2019 when Trump first suggested the U.S. should acquire Greenland.

title: White House: Crackdown needed on US telecoms after massive China hack
shortDescription: The White House urged the FCC to force U.S. telecoms to improve security after nine were breached in the "Salt Typhoon" Chinese hacking campaign.

title: Guatemala open to accepting Trump's deportees | The Excerpt
shortDescription: Plus, why a center for coordinating U.S. efforts to counter foreign disinformation shut down. Sources say Russia downed a plane, killing dozens.

title: GOP opposition shutters US center to fight China and Russia propaganda
shortDescription: The center called out Moscow and Beijing for global disinformation efforts. But the pro-Trump GOP said it became politicized.

title: ICE no ha admitido que Biden liberó 68,000 migrantes | Hechos
shortDescription: Según el Reporte Anual de ICE publicado el 19 de diciembre de 2024, se deportaron 271,484 inmigrantes durante el último año fiscal.

title: No, Trump didn't tell Elon Musk to 'stay in your lane' | Fact check
shortDescription: No such post appears on Trump's Truth Social account, nor are there reports from legitimate news outlets about Trump making the comment.
